text: ane te lokone na kadho, je savara-sanja potana palanaharani bandagi kare che, phakta teni prasannatano hetu rakhe che, te'ono hisaba thodoka pana tamara vise nathi ane tamaro hisaba thodoka pana te'ona vise nathi, ke tame te'one kadhi muko, nahim to tame atyacara karavavala'o manthi tha'i jaso
